headline: Arthur J. Gallagher price target raised to $310 from $290 at Truist
summary: Truist analyst Mark Hughes raised the firm’s price target on Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) to $310 from $290 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares. The firm is adjusting its price target to reflect higher peer valuations in the broker group, though its 2025 EPS view is cut by 60c to $10.65 on dilution from the delayed close of the AssuredPartners acquisition, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Arthur J. Gallagher price target raised to $388 from $377 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen raised the firm’s price target on Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) to $388 from $377 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm updated its model following an investor meeting citing 1Q25 Brokerage organic revenue growth is trending above FY25 guidance, which remains unchanged. Gallagher price target raised
